answers.author: Laura Minnich
answers.text:
The City of Palmdale outsources their entire IT department.  Dave Childs is the new CM there.

answers.author: Rick Aronhalt
answers.text:
We are hosting a webconference this Thursday on cost savings in IT. It will explain how Carrollton, TX explored options for outsourcing IT. Here is a link in case the member is interested. http://learning.icma.org/store/seminar/seminar.php?seminar=11956

author: Tracy Miller
text:
An Alliance member in Florida is trying to find out if any city, county or school board has outsourced their entire department or a portion of the department.  We greatly appreciate your sharing your experience and in particular sharing the process for selection, what services you have outsourced, and has it resulted in savings?  
Please respond here or directly to tmiller@transformgov.org.  Thank you in advance for your assistance.  Happy Memorial Day!  
Tracy Miller  
Florida Regional Director  
Alliance for Innovation  
tmiller@transformgov.org
title: Outsourcing IT
